H0.text: Name the UK budget holiday company specialising in Turkey and Greece which went bust in July 2010. Sunline

H1.text: Name the UK budget holiday company specialising in Turkey and Greece which went bust in July 2010. Libra Holidays

H2.text: Name the UK budget holiday company specialising in Turkey and Greece which went bust in July 2010. Olympic Holidays

H3.text: Name the UK budget holiday company specialising in Turkey and Greece which went bust in July 2010. Goldtrail

A4.text: Goldtrail was a UK-based tour operator that specialised in operated flights and holidays to Turkey and Greece.

A5.text: It collapsed in 2010 and went into administration.
